name: floating-action
description: This custom element will create a floating action button.

scripts.builds:js: babel src/floating-action.js --out-file dist/floating-action.min.js --presets=es2015,babili && cp src/floating-action.js dist/floating-action.js
scripts.build:css: cssnano < src/floating-action.css > dist/floating-action.min.css && cp src/floating-action.css dist/floating-action.css

author: Clay Sissing <claysissing@gmail.com>
